name: Tango Card
description: Add a Tango Card Instance to connect your existing Tango Card account to the Rewards Hub, allowing you to manage your  accounts, customers, orders etc. across multiple Rewards Elements. You will need your Tango Card account information to add an instance.

configuration.name: Max Page Size (or limit)
configuration.description: Tango Card Max Page Size (or limit)

configuration.name: Allow Select Fields parameter
configuration.description: Enables use of global fields query parameter to filter response to only specified fields. This will override any existing vendor functionality on the connector

configuration.name: Event Notification Signature Key
configuration.description: Tango Card Event Notification Signature Key

configuration.name: Default select fields
configuration.description: Generic map used to specify default fields for bulk download and GET /all requests. Each key should be the canonical objectName and values may be specified as a comma-delimited string or a list of strings

configuration.description: Tango Card Time of Getting Token or Performing Authentication

configuration.description: Tango Card  Set time interval for polling application (in minutes)

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: The CEQL search expression. Example: customerIdentifier='cloud-elements'. Only supported fields are 'accountIdentifier', 'customerIdentifier', 'externalRefID', 'startDate', 'endDate'
